short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show a list of comments hidden in pages by programmers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to display what should stay hidden in HTML pages.
Developers often leave comments in the code of pages, sometimes intentionally, sometimes by mistake.
You can find funny comments in the code or useful information to better understand how a site is built and by whom.

With "Dark Secrets" you can also easily copy all comments found in a page into your clipboard.
Comment section can be resized just by dragging the upper edge with your mouse, and closed when not necessary.

Pin this extension and click on its icon to easily enable and disable it in pages!

Happy discovering with "Dark Secrets"!!


If you like this extension, please donate me some bucks via Paypal! Very appreciated! (pin extension to see donation button)
